tool_description: Fetches articles and returns sanitized and formatted HTML of the article content.
name: Article Reader
title: Article Reader

api_list.name: Fetch and clip article
api_list.description: Takes a `url` and optional `html` of an article. Will fetch the article if `html` is not provided, clip, sanitize and return JSON response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-reader.p.rapidapi.com/readability"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-reader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-reader.p.rapidapi.com/readability"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-reader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
